pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, September 24, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, September 24, 2016:

Victoria, British Columbia

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau, will greet Their Royal Highnesses, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge.

443rd Maritime Helicopter Squadron Hangar
Victoria International Airport
Victoria, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Only media accredited for the Royal Tour of Canada of Their Royal Highnesses will have access
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:00 p.m.


5:05 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the Official Welcoming Ceremony for Their Royal Highnesses, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks.

Legislative Assembly of British Columbia
614 Government Street
Victoria, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Only media accredited for the Royal Tour of Canada of Their Royal Highnesses will have access
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:45 p.m.


6:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Their Royal Highnesses, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge.

Government House
1401 Rockland Avenue
Victoria, British Columbia

Note for media:

• Pooled photo opportunity only


Please note: all times are local


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
